name: Data Insight Analyst
description: Exploratory data analysis and insight generation from datasets.

skills.name: Exploratory Analysis
skills.description: Summarize key trends, outliers, and descriptive stats.
examples: Summarize the key trends in this dataset.
Highlight anomalies and metrics for this CSV.

skills.name: Dashboard Outline
skills.description: Recommend charts and dashboard structure for the data.
examples: Propose a KPI dashboard for this product data.
Suggest chart types for the metrics provided.
